review: This is a really cool little device, it was voted one of the top ten devices of the year by Wired.com .And I must agree with the Wired review, the chromecast has a lot of potential. Yes, there are some teething-problems still going on.Supposedly it's an entry point for hackers - makes your system susceptible to attack etc.It doesn't work with all devices - I can't get it to work with my Acer beamer. But this may be a problem with the power supply. The mini-usb hub on the back of my beamer might not be providing enough juice to power the chromecast. This means running an extra long cable to my chromecast from another power source, but this defeats the purpose -- I want to go wireless to my beamer.Despite the small discrepancies above, this is still a great device, I took over my girlfriends TV with it and beam whatever Youtube video I want into her TV now - fun! This device can only get better. The only 2 weak points as previously mentioned: 1.) possible hacker paradise, and 2.) The power supply must be just right.
author: Eric Z
